game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the depths of the Lost City of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned city deep in the heart of the mystical forest, where an ancient artifact of unimaginable power lies hidden. Brave adventurers are needed to explore the treacherous ruins and retrieve this relic before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: 1000 Gold Pieces, +20 Reputation with the Guild of Explorers
game.quest-giver: Eryndor Thorne, Guildmaster of the Guild of Explorers

task.objective: Gather information about the Lost City's location and layout
task.description: Speak with locals and gather rumors to piece together a map of the lost city.
task.location: The Rusty Goblet Tavern, in the town of Willowdale

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous paths of the mystical forest to reach the Lost City's entrance
task.description: Beware the dangers that lurk in the shadows, from giant spiders to ferocious packs of wolves.
task.location: The mystical forest, west of Willowdale

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact and escape the Lost City's deadly traps and puzzles
task.description: Use your wits to overcome obstacles and claim the treasure before it's too late.
task.location: The heart of the Lost City, deep within the mystical forest
